item.description: Editing Places People Experimental Photo Filtering Based on projects CSSgram and CSSFilters. Click on a filter to apply it, add sliders to tune. Photos 1977 Aden Brannan Brooklyn Clarendon Earlybird Gingham Hudson Inkwell Kelvin Lark Lo-Fi Maven Mayfair Moon Nashville Perpetua Reyes Rise Slumber Stinson Toaster Valencia Walden Willow X-Pro II Remove Filter Reset Sliders Contrast Saturation Brightness Sepia Grayscale Invert Hue-Rotate Blur // Click Listener document.

Transcriptions Solos Autumn Leaves - Chet Baker, Trumpet Solo (Playthrough Link) There Will Never Be Another You - Chet Baker, Trumpet Solo (Playthrough Link) Blue Bossa - Dexter Gordon, Sax Solo (Playthrough Link) All The Things You Are in C# - Charles Mingus Quintet, Bass Solo (Playthrough Link) Partial Transcriptions Lingus - Snarky Puppy, Michael League Part Spain - Chick Corea & Return to Forever, Stanley Clarke Part Funk The Fear - Esperanza Spalding, Verse + Prechorus + Chorus Bass (Playthrough Link) Psycho Killer - Talkings Heads, Verse + Chorus + Bridge Bass Other We Don't Care - Kanye West Lost Woods (Ocarina of Time) - Koji Kondo Mii Channel Theme - Kazumi Totaka All transcriptions made with MuseScore

item.title: Things
item.description: As mentioned in the caption of this website I make music and things! Most of the details of how I'm building what I'm working on can be found on my GitHub page, but here are some of the projects I work on that are cool to see. Interactive Graphics I initially made this for use with the haplet, but I ported it over to javascript using P5.
